law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Defense-related activity" means:
the preparation of the United States or a state for defense or war; or
the prosecution of war by the United States or a country with which the United States maintains friendly relations.
"Identification badge" means a badge that a person wears to show the person's identity or right to be in or on any premises described in § 9-704 of this subtitle.
"Identification card" means a card or pass issued for the purpose of establishing the identity and the right of the person to be in or on any premises described in § 9-704 of this subtitle.
